title: Trump administration says Europe faces 'civilizational erasure'
description: European politicians have begun to react, with Germany's Foreign Minister Johann Wadephul saying his country did not need "outside advice".
content: President Donald Trump's administration has warned that Europe faces "civilisational erasure" and questioned whether certain nations can remain reliable allies, in a new strategy document that puts a… [+4857 chars]
